Definição na linha 208 do arquivo LoginUnit.py.

208  def select(self, username=None, database=None):
209  if not username: return False
210  if not database: return False
211 
212  upass = None
213  ulang = None
214 
215  if database.__name__ == "God":
216  try:
217  usr = database.objects.get()
218  except database.DoesNotExist:
219  return False
220  except database.MultipleObjectsReturned:
221  return False
222 
223  username = usr.username
224  upass = usr.password
225  else:
226  try:
227  uid = database.objects.get(value=username, field='NAME')
228  uid = uid.identity
229  upass = database.objects.get(identity=uid, field='PASSWORD')
230  upass = upass.value
231  except database.DoesNotExist:
232  return False
233 
234  if(database.__name__ == "Student" or
235  database.__name__ == "Professor"):
236  try:
237  ulang= database.objects.get(identity=uid, field='LANGUAGE')
238  ulang= ulang.value
239  except database.DoesNotExist:
240  return False
241  else:
242  ulang = settings.LANGUAGE_CODE
243 
244 
245  return { 'name': username, 'password': upass, 'language': ulang }
